item.question: How do you tell the difference between a monarch and a viceroy butterfly?
item.answer: One vein in the hindwing has an extra lump on the viceroy
Viceroy has an extra black band on the hindwings

item.question: Butterflies belong in which insect order:
item.explanation: Both butterflies and moths are in the order lepidoptera, which is latin for "scaly wings"

item.question: All spiders create webs.
item.explanation: All spiders make and use silk but many do not create webs.

item.question: Spiders move through hydraulics.
item.explanation: They move by pumping blood into their legs. Some jumping spiders can jump up to 50 times their own body length using this method.

item.question: Spiders are incredibly cute, especially fuzzy jumping spiders.
